about_the_game:
Open your restaurant and lead it to success.

Create your menu by selecting what dishes to serve. Supply the kitchen accordingly if you do not want to run out of ingredients during service! You can do it yourself, or you can hire a supply manager.

Open the doors of your restaurant and start cooking! Cut, blend, grill, bake and fry ingredients: elevate them to make fantastic dishes. Plate the food and bring it to the delivery counter, where waiters will pick it up. Be fast! Guests are not willing to wait forever and may walk out of the restaurant. Line cooks are there to help you, but they also make mistakes. Supervise, coordinate and motivate them! It will take the right combination of carrot and stick to get the best out of your team.

Prepare delicious desserts in the pastry laboratory. Don't make too many - you want to serve only fresh and tasty cakes to your guests. A pastry chef may help you discover new recipes and will keep your restaurant well-stocked.

Hire waiters and line cooks, you cannot run a restaurant all by yourself. Select your personnel wisely by checking both technical and moral skills. Assign cooks to the proper station, depending on their capabilities and your needs in the kitchen. Soft skills influence how they react to unexpected events and to your discipline. Experience affects performance, while morale affects loyalty. It is easy to find good workers, it is harder to keep them.

Hire an HR manager if you do not want to deal with all of that… but delegating it all may hide pitfalls.

Get your finances in order, running a restaurant is a difficult business and must be profitable too. If you need a cash injection, you can look for partners or for a loan.

Fast food, casual or fine dining, no matter what style you pick, the final aspiration of any chef is to run a starred restaurant. Quality and consistency will get you VIP guests, that will boost your reputation and allow you to be visited by an inspector… but nobody knows when this will happen!

Every event and every decision influences your path, making your game absolutely unique.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+ (Intel editor) Big Sur 11.0 (Apple silicon Editor)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.3 GHz or Apple Silicon or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Head Chef

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-4100
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Head Chef is a restaurant management game. Supply the kitchen, select your staff, create a delicious menu and… cook! Make your guests happy and find your way to the stars. Keep control of your team and finances, because the higher you climb, the harder you fall.
supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French
